title: Anna's Organic Shop and Garden Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic cafe offering a dish-of-the-day each day with a vegan choice. Gluten or special diet accommodation is possible with advance request from the owner. More vegetarian and vegan meals served. Starting 1st June to 15 September, the cafe is open daily from 8am to 10pm.
